A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Having seen all Star Wars movies on their theatrical release (yes\, i'm an old fart) this is by far the worst:

- Poor script
- Poor acting
- Even more than episode 7\, it's a pure Disney money making vehicle mixing arbitrary pledges of the original episodes 4 - 6 together.
- On the bright side\, SFX are pretty good. But that's about all positive credit I can give.
- And something I can't really forgive: Rubbing SJW nonsense into your face as a big No No.

This movie really destroyed Star Wars for me and I most probably won't see any other flick of this franchise.
